Name.description: Row Name: this is only needed for Unreal Datatables, and can be anything unique per quest. Not used in the quest API

Identifier.description: Identifier of this quest. Must be globally unique across all quests in all data files

bPlayerVisible.description: Whether it's suggested to display this quest to players, or whether it's for internal tracking only.

Title.description: The player-visible title. To support localisation, use NSLOCTEXT("[Package]", "StringID", "Default text")

DescriptionWhenActive.description: Quest description while it's not successfully completed. To support localisation, use NSLOCTEXT("[Package]", "StringID", "Default text")

DescriptionWhenCompleted.description: Quest description when completed. If blank, use DescriptionWhenActive.

AutoAccept.description: Whether this quest should be auto-accepted when its prerequisites are met.

PrerequisiteQuests.description: List of Quest IDs which must all be completed before this quest is auto-accepted (if enabled).

PrerequisiteQuestFailures.description: List of Quest IDs which all must have failed before this quest is auto-accepted (if enabled).

Objectives.description: List of sequential objectives which carry the quest forward. Can branch but always in order. Groups nested Tasks which are more flexible.

items.description: An objective groups potentially multiple tasks which are the things a player completes. Objectives are always considered to be in order.

Identifier.description: Identifier for the objective. Must be unique within the Quest.

Title.description: Player-viaible title for the objective. Can be blank if you only have one task or do not wish to display this level

DescriptionWhenActive.description: Optional description when the objective is not completed.

DescriptionWhenCompleted.description: Optional description when the objective is completed.

bSequentialTasks.description: Whether the nested tasks must be performed in order.

NumberOfMandatoryTasksRequired.description: The number of nested mandatory tasks that must be completed to complete this objective. Default -1 means 'all mandatory tasks'.

Branch.description: The quest branch this objective is on. If blank, objective is always included. If you specify a branch, this objective will be ignored unless the Quest has that branch enabled.

Tasks.description: A list of tasks that make up the objective. The list can be sequential or not, can have mandatory or optional tasks

items.description: A task is a unit of progress, the main thing the player will be triggering during play

Identifier.description: Identifier for the task. Must be unique within the Quest (not just the objective)

bMandatory.description: Whether the task is mandatory. An objective MUST contain at least one mandatory task.

TargetNumber.description: A count of things that must be done to complete this task, allowing partial completion of a task. The task completes when this number is reached

TimeLimit.description: Optional time limit to apply to this task, which starts as soon as it is the next mandatory task. 0 indicates no time limit
